Introduction

The SenStore server provides an object-oriented database with remote access for Structural Health Monitoring applications.

Open-source Distribution

The SenStore open-source distribution consists of the following items:

  • SenStoreServer package, with the SenStore database server implementation and backup/restore scripts;
  • SenStoreClient package, with the SenStore database definition, Python client interface wrapper, and client examples; and
  • SenStoreExtras package, with database definition parser and programmer development documentation.
